Bringing our tiny Muslims an engaging book to aid parents in teaching the key principles of Belief (Eemaan) in Islam.
IBI Eemaan Series teaching young readers (6 months – 4 years) about faith in Islam.
Based on the understanding from the hadith of the Prophet Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم. Belief (Eemaan): “It is that you believe in Allah, and His Angels, and His Books, and His Messengers, and in the Last Day, and in Fate (Qadar), both in its good and bad.” (Sahih Muslim, Book 1:1).
